title: User Testing-Based Design to Improve User Experience in E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and foundational knowledge in mathematics education
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance the efficiency of using e-learning systems for delivering mathematics education content to pre-service and in-service teachers, with a focus on acquiring UX improvement strategies applicable in the short term through mobile-optimized microlearning.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more user experience (UX) evaluation metrics in an e-learning system interface.
Learners can analyze feedback data collected through user testing to derive two or more improvement points.
Learners can design one or more layout improvements for mathematics educational content suitable for mobile microlearning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
